name: Encode Encore!
description:
Nenena wants to buy her boyfriend an expensive wallet for his birthday, but to do that, she needs money... The best way to do that... is getting a sugar daddy. That sugar daddy? You!

At first you can lift her skirt, grab her ass, you know, the little stuff... But keep your relationship going, and soon enough she'll be ready to show even MORE thanks... That's when things get really exciting!

There are braless, pantyless, and otherwise disrobed variations to enjoy! Including the changes in expression, that's over 700 different scene variations!

DLC Additions:
Encore! adds many new sex scenes including anal, bondage, 69, kissing sex, masturbation, footjobs, and more! A new area, the shopping mall, has 5 brand new encounters with Nenena. You can even invite her back to your room!

Trophies, items, and skills have all been added, along with a dedicated page to view Nenena's sex stats.

Enjoy some more time with Nenena and discover the 3 new endings!
​
